title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.4 - License as a dentist by endorsement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.4 - License as a dentist by endorsement

State Regulations
(a) For endorsement of a dental license
issued by another jurisdiction of the United States or a Canadian province the
applicant shall submit satisfactory evidence of: (1)
having met all requirements of section
59.6
of this Subchapter; and
(2)
lawful and reputable
practice in dentistry or not less th an eight months during the two years next
preceding the filing of the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
61.4

Amended

New

York State Register May 23, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 21, eff. 5/23/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
